\item

\begingl[glneveryline={\EnglishGlossA,\EnglishGlossB}]
If[] any[] bhikkhu,[] having[] given[] consent[] to[] legitimate[] (legal)[] actions,[] should[] afterwards[] engage[] in[] the[] act[] of[] criticising,[] (this[] is[] a[] case)[] involving[] expiation.[]
\endgl
